# Hive Fleet Obsidian SSOT – Visualizations

<!-- Generated by export_ssot_diagrams.py -->

## Mission Lifecycle

### Flowchart

```mermaid
%%{init: {'themeVariables': {'fontSize': '18px', 'lineHeight': '26px', 'fontFamily': 'Inter, Arial, sans-serif'}}}%%
flowchart TD
    classDef step fill:#0d3b66,stroke:#0d3b66,stroke-width:1px,color:#ffffff
    CaptureIntent["Capture Intent"]:::step
    ClarifyMission1["Clarify Mission 1"]:::step
    ClarifyMission2["Clarify Mission 2"]:::step
    SelectWorkflow["Select Workflow"]:::step
    PublishMissionIntent["Publish Mission Intent"]:::step
    DeployOrchestration["Deploy Orchestration"]:::step
    CoordinateSwarm["Coordinate Swarm"]:::step
    ValidateResults["Validate Results"]:::step
    DeliverOutcome["Deliver Outcome"]:::step
    UpdateKnowledge["Update Knowledge"]:::step

    CaptureIntent -->|clarification → prior| ClarifyMission1
    ClarifyMission1 -->|clarification → prior| ClarifyMission2
    ClarifyMission2 -->|clarification| SelectWorkflow
    SelectWorkflow -->|selection| PublishMissionIntent
    PublishMissionIntent -->|missionIntent| DeployOrchestration
    DeployOrchestration -->|taskSignal| CoordinateSwarm
    CoordinateSwarm -->|missionFeedback| ValidateResults
    CoordinateSwarm -->|telemetry| ValidateResults
    CoordinateSwarm -->|provenance| ValidateResults
    ValidateResults -->|digest| DeliverOutcome
    CoordinateSwarm -->|insights| UpdateKnowledge
```

### Sequence

```mermaid
%%{init: {'themeVariables': {'fontSize': '18px', 'lineHeight': '26px', 'fontFamily': 'Inter, Arial, sans-serif'}}}%%
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    participant CaptureIntent as Capture Intent
    participant ClarifyMission1 as Clarify Mission 1
    participant ClarifyMission2 as Clarify Mission 2
    participant SelectWorkflow as Select Workflow
    participant PublishMissionIntent as Publish Mission Intent
    participant DeployOrchestration as Deploy Orchestration
    participant CoordinateSwarm as Coordinate Swarm
    participant ValidateResults as Validate Results
    participant DeliverOutcome as Deliver Outcome
    participant UpdateKnowledge as Update Knowledge
    CaptureIntent->>ClarifyMission1: clarification → prior
    ClarifyMission1->>ClarifyMission2: clarification → prior
    ClarifyMission2->>SelectWorkflow: clarification
    SelectWorkflow->>PublishMissionIntent: selection
    PublishMissionIntent->>DeployOrchestration: missionIntent
    DeployOrchestration->>CoordinateSwarm: taskSignal
    CoordinateSwarm->>ValidateResults: missionFeedback
    ValidateResults->>DeliverOutcome: digest
```

### State Progression

```mermaid
%%{init: {'themeVariables': {'fontSize': '18px', 'lineHeight': '26px', 'fontFamily': 'Inter, Arial, sans-serif'}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> CaptureIntent
    state "Capture Intent" as CaptureIntent
    CaptureIntent --> ClarifyMission1
    state "Clarify Mission 1" as ClarifyMission1
    ClarifyMission1 --> ClarifyMission2
    state "Clarify Mission 2" as ClarifyMission2
    ClarifyMission2 --> SelectWorkflow
    state "Select Workflow" as SelectWorkflow
    SelectWorkflow --> PublishMissionIntent
    state "Publish Mission Intent" as PublishMissionIntent
    PublishMissionIntent --> DeployOrchestration
    state "Deploy Orchestration" as DeployOrchestration
    DeployOrchestration --> CoordinateSwarm
    state "Coordinate Swarm" as CoordinateSwarm
    CoordinateSwarm --> ValidateResults
    state "Validate Results" as ValidateResults
    ValidateResults --> DeliverOutcome
    state "Deliver Outcome" as DeliverOutcome
    DeliverOutcome --> UpdateKnowledge
    state "Update Knowledge" as UpdateKnowledge
    UpdateKnowledge --> [*]
```

## Structural Blocks

### Block Definition Diagram

```mermaid
%%{init: {'themeVariables': {'fontSize': '18px', 'lineHeight': '26px', 'fontFamily': 'Inter, Arial, sans-serif'}}}%%
classDiagram
    class AutomationRituals {
        +smokeIndicator : SmokeTestIndicator
        +hourglassBinding : HourglassIntegrationStatus
    }
    class EnvironmentScaffold {
        +devContainer : DevContainerBlueprint
        +workflowBinding : WorkflowEngineBinding
        +temporal : TemporalNamespace
        +langGraph : LangGraphProfile
        +eventSpine : EventSpineProfile
        +parallelCompute : ParallelComputeProfile
    }
    class EvolutionOptimization {
        +qdSupport : QualityDiversitySupport
    }
    class FeaturePolicyLayer {
        +featureSupport : FeaturePolicySupport
    }
    class IDEBaseline {
        +version : IDEVersionConstraint
        +extensions : ExtensionBaseline
        +runbook : ToolingRunbook
    }
    class KnowledgeMemory {
        +knowledgeSupport : KnowledgeCapability
    }
    class MCPDeck {
        +trustProfile : MCPTrustProfile
    }
    class ObservabilityGovernance {
        +telemetrySupport : TelemetrySupport
        +provenanceSupport : ProvenanceSupport
    }
    class OrchestrationCore {
        +workflowSupport : WorkflowSupportIndicator
    }
    class PersonaForge {
        +catalog : PersonaCatalog
    }
    class SignalEventSpine {
        +deliveryAssurance : DeliveryReliability
        +stigmergyReadback : StigmergyEfficiencyMetric
    }
    class SwarmExecutionFabric {
        +persistentAgentSpan : ConcurrentAgentCapacity
        +hierarchyPattern : HierarchicalScalingPattern
        +stigmergyEfficiency : StigmergyEfficiencyMetric
    }
    class SwarmlordAssembly {
        ...
    }
    class SwarmlordFacade {
        +personaName : PersonaIdentifier
        +persistentMemory : PersistentMemoryFlag
        +agentCapacity : ConcurrentAgentCapacity
    }
    class ToolingAssembly {
        ...
    }
    class User {
        +personaId : PersonaIdentifier
    }
    class WarChestForge {
        +artifacts : WarChestArtifact
        +fundingSignals : FundingTelemetry
    }
    SwarmlordAssembly *-- User : user
    SwarmlordAssembly *-- SwarmlordFacade : swarmlord
    SwarmlordAssembly *-- OrchestrationCore : orchestration
    SwarmlordAssembly *-- SwarmExecutionFabric : swarmFabric
    SwarmlordAssembly *-- KnowledgeMemory : knowledgeStore
    SwarmlordAssembly *-- SignalEventSpine : signalSpine
    SwarmlordAssembly *-- FeaturePolicyLayer : policyLayer
    SwarmlordAssembly *-- ObservabilityGovernance : observability
    SwarmlordAssembly *-- EvolutionOptimization : evolution
    ToolingAssembly *-- IDEBaseline : ide
    ToolingAssembly *-- MCPDeck : mcp
    ToolingAssembly *-- EnvironmentScaffold : environment
    ToolingAssembly *-- AutomationRituals : rituals
    ToolingAssembly *-- PersonaForge : persona
    ToolingAssembly *-- WarChestForge : warChest
```

    SwarmlordAssembly -->|swarmlord| SwarmlordFacade
    SwarmlordAssembly -->|orchestration| OrchestrationCore
    SwarmlordAssembly -->|swarmFabric| SwarmExecutionFabric
    SwarmlordAssembly -->|knowledgeStore| KnowledgeMemory
    SwarmlordAssembly -->|signalSpine| SignalEventSpine
    SwarmlordAssembly -->|policyLayer| FeaturePolicyLayer
    SwarmlordAssembly -->|observability| ObservabilityGovernance
    SwarmlordAssembly -->|evolution| EvolutionOptimization
    ToolingAssembly{ToolingAssembly}
    ToolingAssembly -->|ide| IDEBaseline
    ToolingAssembly -->|mcp| MCPDeck
    ToolingAssembly -->|environment| EnvironmentScaffold
    ToolingAssembly -->|rituals| AutomationRituals
    ToolingAssembly -->|persona| PersonaForge
    ToolingAssembly -->|warChest| WarChestForge
```

### Port Definitions

| Port | Attributes |
| --- | --- |
| ClarificationExchangePort | artifact: ClarificationArtifact |
| KnowledgeInsightPort | insight: KnowledgeInsight |
| MCPPolicyPort | policy: MCPTrustProfile |
| MissionFeedbackPort | feedback: MissionFeedback |
| MissionIntentPort | artifact: MissionIntentArtifact |
| ObservabilityPort | observability: ObservabilityProfile<br>featureFlags: FeatureFlagProfile |
| PersonaOutputPort | personaSet: PersonaCatalog<br>warChest: WarChestArtifact<br>funding: FundingTelemetry |
| ProvenancePort | reference: ProvenanceReference |
| TaskSignalPort | signal: TaskSignal |
| TelemetryPort | record: TelemetryRecord |
| ToolingStatusPort | smokeStatus: SmokeTestIndicator<br>integrationStatus: HourglassIntegrationStatus |
| WorkflowBindingPort | workflow: WorkflowEngineBinding<br>temporalNs: TemporalNamespace<br>langGraphProfile: LangGraphProfile<br>eventSpine: EventSpineProfile<br>parallelCompute: ParallelComputeProfile |

### Part Port Summary

| Part | Ports |
| --- | --- |
| AutomationRituals | statusIn: ToolingStatusPort<br>policyIn: MCPPolicyPort<br>workflowIn: WorkflowBindingPort<br>observabilityOut: ObservabilityPort<br>statusOut: ToolingStatusPort |
| EnvironmentScaffold | workflowOut: WorkflowBindingPort |
| IDEBaseline | statusOut: ToolingStatusPort |
| KnowledgeMemory | insightsIn: KnowledgeInsightPort |
| MCPDeck | policyOut: MCPPolicyPort |
| ObservabilityGovernance | telemetryIn: TelemetryPort<br>provenanceIn: ProvenancePort |
| OrchestrationCore | missionIntentIn: MissionIntentPort<br>taskSignalOut: TaskSignalPort |
| PersonaForge | observabilityIn: ObservabilityPort<br>personaOut: PersonaOutputPort |
| SignalEventSpine | telemetryIn: TelemetryPort<br>telemetryOut: TelemetryPort<br>provenanceIn: ProvenancePort<br>provenanceOut: ProvenancePort |
| SwarmExecutionFabric | taskSignalIn: TaskSignalPort<br>missionFeedbackOut: MissionFeedbackPort<br>telemetryOut: TelemetryPort<br>provenanceOut: ProvenancePort<br>insightsOut: KnowledgeInsightPort |
| SwarmlordFacade | clarificationIn: ClarificationExchangePort<br>missionIntentOut: MissionIntentPort<br>missionFeedbackIn: MissionFeedbackPort<br>telemetryIn: TelemetryPort<br>provenanceIn: ProvenancePort<br>insightsIn: KnowledgeInsightPort |
| User | clarificationOut: ClarificationExchangePort |
| WarChestForge | statusIn: ToolingStatusPort<br>personaIn: PersonaOutputPort<br>warChestOut: PersonaOutputPort |

### Connector Table

| Connector | Source | Target |
| --- | --- | --- |
| userIntentExchange | user.clarificationOut | swarmlord.clarificationIn |
| missionIntentFanout | swarmlord.missionIntentOut | orchestration.missionIntentIn |
| orchestrationDispatch | orchestration.taskSignalOut | swarmFabric.taskSignalIn |
| swarmFeedbackLoop | swarmFabric.missionFeedbackOut | swarmlord.missionFeedbackIn |
| swarmTelemetryFlow | swarmFabric.telemetryOut | signalSpine.telemetryIn |
| telemetryOversight | signalSpine.telemetryOut | observability.telemetryIn |
| swarmProvenanceFlow | swarmFabric.provenanceOut | signalSpine.provenanceIn |
| provenanceOversight | signalSpine.provenanceOut | observability.provenanceIn |
| insightBroadcast | swarmFabric.insightsOut | swarmlord.insightsIn |
| insightAbsorption | swarmlord.insightsIn | knowledgeStore.insightsIn |
| telemetryRelay | signalSpine.telemetryOut | swarmlord.telemetryIn |
| provenanceRelay | signalSpine.provenanceOut | swarmlord.provenanceIn |
| ideStatus | ide.statusOut | rituals.statusIn |
| mcpPolicy | mcp.policyOut | rituals.policyIn |
| workflowBinding | environment.workflowOut | rituals.workflowIn |
| ritualTelemetry | rituals.observabilityOut | persona.observabilityIn |
| personaCatalog | persona.personaOut | warChest.personaIn |
| ritualStatus | rituals.statusOut | warChest.statusIn |

mindmap
  SwarmlordAssemblies((Swarmlord Assemblies))
    SwarmlordAssembly
      user: User
      swarmlord: SwarmlordFacade
      orchestration: OrchestrationCore
      swarmFabric: SwarmExecutionFabric
      knowledgeStore: KnowledgeMemory
      signalSpine: SignalEventSpine

      mcp: MCPDeck
      environment: EnvironmentScaffold
      rituals: AutomationRituals
      persona: PersonaForge
      warChest: WarChestForge
```

| Part | Attributes |
| --- | --- |
| AutomationRituals | smokeIndicator: SmokeTestIndicator<br>hourglassBinding: HourglassIntegrationStatus |
| EnvironmentScaffold | devContainer: DevContainerBlueprint<br>workflowBinding: WorkflowEngineBinding<br>temporal: TemporalNamespace<br>langGraph: LangGraphProfile<br>eventSpine: EventSpineProfile<br>parallelCompute: ParallelComputeProfile |
| EvolutionOptimization | qdSupport: QualityDiversitySupport |
| FeaturePolicyLayer | featureSupport: FeaturePolicySupport |
| IDEBaseline | version: IDEVersionConstraint<br>extensions: ExtensionBaseline<br>runbook: ToolingRunbook |
| KnowledgeMemory | knowledgeSupport: KnowledgeCapability |
| MCPDeck | trustProfile: MCPTrustProfile |
| ObservabilityGovernance | telemetrySupport: TelemetrySupport<br>provenanceSupport: ProvenanceSupport |
| OrchestrationCore | workflowSupport: WorkflowSupportIndicator |
| PersonaForge | catalog: PersonaCatalog |
| SignalEventSpine | deliveryAssurance: DeliveryReliability<br>stigmergyReadback: StigmergyEfficiencyMetric |
| SwarmExecutionFabric | persistentAgentSpan: ConcurrentAgentCapacity<br>hierarchyPattern: HierarchicalScalingPattern<br>stigmergyEfficiency: StigmergyEfficiencyMetric |
| SwarmlordAssembly | — |
| SwarmlordFacade | personaName: PersonaIdentifier<br>persistentMemory: PersistentMemoryFlag<br>agentCapacity: ConcurrentAgentCapacity |
| ToolingAssembly | — |
| User | personaId: PersonaIdentifier |
| WarChestForge | artifacts: WarChestArtifact<br>fundingSignals: FundingTelemetry |

## Requirements

### Table

| Name | ID | Text |
| --- | --- | --- |
| ClarificationSequence | — | — |
| G28_REQ_001_PersistentSwarmlord | G28-REQ-001 | Every USER is paired with a persistent Swarmlord persona that remains their only interface. The Swarmlord must coordinate up to 100 concurrent agents and deliver quorum-backed outcomes. |
| G28_REQ_002_HiveWorkflows | G28-REQ-002 | The Swarmlord selects among HIVE, GROWTH, SWARM, PREY workflows based on user intent while keeping the user insulated from internal complexity. |
| G28_REQ_003_PersistentSwarm | G28-REQ-003 | The Swarmlord maintains a persistent swarm of at least 100 concurrently active agents that can cycle through workflows without teardown between missions. |
| G28_REQ_004_HierarchicalScaling | G28-REQ-004 | The orchestration stack must support hierarchical stigmergy so the Swarmlord can fan out mission intent across subordinate clusters, enabling 10^6+ agents without direct control calls. |
| G28_REQ_005_StigmergyEfficiency | G28-REQ-005 | Stigmergic coordination shall reduce direct communication events by at least an order of magnitude compared to one-to-one agent polling, with results aggregated via a shared blackboard interface. |
| G28_REQ_006_ToolingBaseline | G28-REQ-006 | Before activating swarm orchestration the Generation 28 cockpit shall confirm a VS Code ≥1.105 stack with Copilot agent mode, Continue hybrid agents, and an auditable mcp.json trust profile via a repeatable smoke test (scripts/dev/check_tooling.sh). |
| G28_REQ_007_MCPTrustGuardrails | G28-REQ-007 | Model Context Protocol servers must declare trust posture per PREY phase, gating high-impact tools and logging approvals so swarm automation stays bounded. |
| G28_REQ_008_HourglassWorkflowBridge | G28-REQ-008 | Obsidian Horizon Hourglass outputs shall bind into Temporal workflows, LangGraph agent graphs, NATS JetStream subjects, Ray task pools, and Postgres/pgvector storage with OpenTelemetry and OpenFeature instrumentation. |
| G28_REQ_009_PersonaWarChest | G28-REQ-009 | Hourglass briefs must map into the OBSIDIAN persona stack and mint war chest artifacts with funding telemetry for mission reinvestment. |
| StigmergicControl | — | — |

    PersonaWarChestPipeline_ForgeWarChestArtifacts["PersonaWarChestPipeline.ForgeWarChestArtifacts"]
